subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo, whose 42 goals last season helped Manchester United secure Champions League and Premier League titles, won the Golden Ball award for soccer’s best player. Ronaldo, 23, a winger from Portugal, became the first United player to receive the award since George Best in 1968.
